mapper.select: select consid, companyname, consarea, consintroduction, profilerenameimg from Constructors
select Round(avg(rvavg),1) as rvavg, Count(rvavg) as count, consid from review group by consid

select a.PFPHOTONUM, a.PFORIGINALNAME, a.PFRENAME, a.PFCOMENT, a.PFNUM, b.CONSID from (select * from portfoliofile where pfnum in ( select max(pfnum) pfnum from portfolio group by consid, pfrename )) a right join CONSTRUCTORS b on a.consid = b.consid

select rvnum,rvkind,rvprice,rvquality,rvprofessional,rvresponsible,rvavg, rvperiod,rvregion,rvbuildingtype,rvarea,rvspacious,rvprice2,rvcritique, to_char(to_date(rvdate,'yyyy/mm/dd'), 'rryy/mm/dd') as rvdate,consid,userid from review where consid = #{consid} order by rvnum desc
mapper.update: update constructors set pfintroduction = #{pfintroduction} where consid = #{consid}
mapper.select: select * from portfoliofile where PFNUM = #{pfnum} order by PFPHOTONUM asc

select * from (select a.pfnum, a.consid, min(nvl(a.pfrename, 0)) pfrename, min(nvl(b.pftitle, 0)) pftitle from portfoliofile a join portfolio b on a.pfnum = b.pfnum group by a.pfnum, a.consid) where consid = #{consid} order by pfnum desc
